lead_paragraph: The candidate and first lady took obvious delight in singing each other’s praises as they campaigned together in the hotly contested state of North Carolina.

headline.print_headline: Clinton Basks in the First Lady’s Soaring Popularity on the Campaign Trail
headline.main: Hillary Clinton Basks in First Lady’s Soaring Popularity on the Campaign Trail

snippet: The candidate and first lady took obvious delight in singing each other’s praises as they campaigned together in the hotly contested state of North Carolina....
abstract: Hillary Clinton makes first joint campaign appearance with First Lady Michelle Obama in Winston-Salem, NC, putting aside past conflicts in display of mutual admiration; Clinton's campaign is drawing on Obama's popularity to boost support among African-Americans, women and young people.
